title: The Unknown Eiffel
creator_credit: Joan Laskoff and Lennox Art Group
brief_description: Biography of Alexandre Gustave Eiffel whoo pioneered metal construction techniques, including prefabrication. Shows some of his most famous works, quotations from Eiffel’s own writings, drawings and plans and contemporary paintings and drawings are used throughout.
